articles.title: Conviction Won’t Be a Financial Death Sentence for Trump Organization
articles.description: The former president’s family business will be forever tarred, but the maximum penalty it faces is relatively mild.

articles.title: Yankees, Aaron Judge Agree To Record-Setting Deal
articles.description: The Yankees have agreed to a record-setting nine-year contract with reigning American League MVP Aaron Judge. Read more at MLB Trade Rumors.
articles.content:
The New York Yankees are re-signing reigning American League MVP Aaron Judge, reports Jon Morosi of MLB.com. It’s a nine-year, $360MM contract, tweets Ken Rosenthal of The Athletic. The agreement is still pending the completion of a physical.

articles.title: China eases Covid restrictions in major shift after protests
articles.description: China announced a major step away from the strict “zero-Covid” controls on quarantine and testing after rare mass nationwide protests.
articles.content:
Officials have defended the policy as necessary to save lives in a country where the fragile health care system could be overwhelmed by uncontrolled outbreaks, touting China’s low death toll as evidence of the superiority of Communist Party rule.

articles.title: Southwest reinstates dividend after three years as travel rebounds
articles.description: Southwest's 18 cents a share dividend will pay out on Jan. 31
articles.content:
Southwest Airlines is reinstating its quarterly dividend that it suspended at the start of the Covid-19 pandemic in 2020, the latest sign of the airline industry's recovery.

articles.title: Supreme Court weighs North Carolina dispute that could upend election law
articles.description: The Supreme Court hears a major case that could upend election law as it considers whether to reinstate GOP-drawn congressional districts in North Carolina.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON — The Supreme Court on Wednesday will hear a major case that could upend election law as the justices consider whether to reinstate Republican-drawn congressional districts in North Carolina.

articles.title: Ronaldo loses Portugal spot to sully World Cup journey
articles.description: DOHA, Qatar (AP) — So, the dream is still alive for Cristiano Ronaldo. Soccer's most prolific modern-day scorer might yet, at the age of 37 and probably playing in his last World Cup , claim the one major title to elude him in a career like no other.

articles.title: Woman who watched boyfriend kill 6 of his family members in Chicago robbery sentenced to 25 years in prison
articles.description: A woman who watched her former boyfriend kill six members of his family, including two young boys, at their Chicago home then helped him steal their property was sentenced Tuesday to 25 years in prison.
